Articles.Content:
The idea here is that whenever you want to built a craft, you can have a sort of checklist. Basically, before launch, you're given a list of things the craft needs to survive; generators, parachutes, engines, etc. etc. If you don't have these, then you can either just launch or head back to the VAB/SPH to fix the problem.

If you just want to see things fly rampantly with no regard for sentient life, then you can turn off the checklist.

Nifty, huh?
You might want to check out WernherChecker.
